snippet: Michael Brown spent part of his last morning chatting with some workmen about Jesus. Police officer Darren Wilson got a call to help a feverish child. Dorian Johnson got up at 7 a.m. with the intention of getting breakfast for his girlfriend....

headline.print_headline: In Ferguson, Mundane Choices Lead to Tragedy
headline.main: In Ferguson, Mundane Choices Lead to Tragedy

lead_paragraph: Michael Brown spent part of his last morning chatting with some workmen about Jesus. Police officer Darren Wilson got a call to help a feverish child. Dorian Johnson got up at 7 a.m. with the intention of getting breakfast for his girlfriend.
